HDG.FS.content: when Heidegger first attempts to exit prison of consciousness (in Being and Time), not restoring realism against idealism: realism (assurance a world exists for subject) dependent on Cartesianism [Heidegger attempting to think Greek sense of egō]

HDG.LP.content: since Plato, soul suprasensuous (Übersinnlichen), if it appears in sensible world, does so as a castaway (verschlagen) > on Earth, soul doesn’t have the right cast (rechten Schlag), doesn’t belong, is something strange (ein Fremdes) [body is soul’s prison]
